subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer won his second straight Tour of the Gila in New Mexico, holding off Tom Danielson by 59 seconds while his teammate Lance Armstrong finished 17th.
snippet: Levi Leipheimer won his second straight Tour of the Gila in New Mexico, holding off Tom Danielson by 59 seconds while his teammate Lance Armstrong finished 17th.
